where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_svc_sales_item set SALES_ID = #{salesId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STAFF_ID = #{staffId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SALES_ST = #{salesSt,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORDINAL = #{ordinal,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PARTIAL_ORDINAL = #{partialOrdinal,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PATH_TP = #{pathTp,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_STAMP = #{isStamp,jdbcType=BIT}, CAT_NM = #{catNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CAT_CD = #{catCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ITEM_NM = #{itemNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_CD = #{itemCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_TP = #{itemTp,jdbcType=CHAR}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PURCHASE_PRICE = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, `COUNT` = #{count,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, SALES = #{sales,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DISCOUNT = #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ACTUAL_SALES_AMT = #{actualSalesAmt,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, NET_SALES = #{netSales,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TAX = #{tax,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SERVICE_CHARGE = #{serviceCharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ORDER_TM = #{orderTm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORDER_TM_LOCAL = #{orderTmLocal,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPT_ID = #{optId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPT_NM = #{optNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPT_CD = #{optCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPT_PRICE = #{optPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_PACKING = #{isPacking,jdbcType=BIT}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_svc_sales_item
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT DISTINCT I.ITEM_NM AS ITEM_NM, O.PAY_METHOD AS CAT_CD, O.ORDER_ST AS SALES_ST, SUM(I.PRICE * I.COUNT) AS PRICE, SUM(I.COUNT) AS COUNT, SUM(I.OPT_PRICE) AS OPT_PRICE, DATE_FORMAT(O.ORDER_TM_LOCAL, '%Y-%m-%d') AS ORDER_TM_LOCAL, OrderOptionListEx3(I.ITEM_ID, #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, O.PAY_METHOD, O.ORDER_ST) AS memo, (SELECT A.SHORT_NAME FROM TB_SVC_ITEM A WHERE A.BRAND_ID = O.BRAND_ID AND A.STORE_ID = O.STORE_ID AND A.ID = I.ITEM_ID) AS CAT_NM FROM TB_SVC_SALES O, TB_SVC_SALES_ITEM I WHERE O.ID = I.SALES_ID AND O.BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND O.STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND CONVERT_TZ( O.SALES_TM, '+00:00', '+09:00' ) BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE( #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND STR_TO_DATE( #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) GROUP BY I.ITEM_NM, O.PAY_METHOD, O.ORDER_ST ORDER BY O.PAY_METHOD DESC, I.ITEM_NM ASC

SELECT DISTINCT S.ID, DATE_FORMAT(S.ORDER_TM_LOCAL,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS ORDER_TM_LOCAL, S.RECEIPT_NO AS RECEIPT_NO, COUNT(I.SALES_ID) AS COUNT, SUM(I.SALES) AS PRICE, S.ORDER_ST AS ORDER_ST FROM TB_SVC_SALES S, TB_SVC_SALES_ITEM I WHERE S.ID = I.SALES_ID AND S.BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND S.STORE_ID = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND CONVERT_TZ( S.SALES_TM, '+00:00', '+09:00' ) BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE( #{startDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AND STR_TO_DATE( #{endDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) GROUP BY I.SALES_ID ORDER BY S.ID DESC
